transcript: I know you are all geek really I do. I know you meant for this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and everything but I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

segments.text: I know you are all geek really I do.
I know you meant for this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and everything but
I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I know you are, Augie.  Really, I do.  I know you meant for this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and everything.  But I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.
